title: Pirates! Showdown v1.1.50 Premium [APK] [Paid]--[[ InNoCeNt Sh@h
description:

[img]http://s26.postimg.org/ame57k17t/poster.jpg[/img]

[color=red][size=6]              ::Description::[/size][/color]
Pirates! Showdown is a fast-paced game combining real-time strategy(RTS) and defense tactics. Face off against the fearsome Red Hand privateers in thrilling head-to-head pirate battles on the high sea! Capture towns and other structures to strengthen your defense and increase your gold supply.

ACTION!
Fast paced gameplay with RTS and defense tactics.

WEIGH ANCHOR!
Command your fleet of ships as you send them to intercept the enemy pirates or lay siege to land targets. Send an armada of Brigantines or save your gold for a massive Ship of the Line!

CAPTURE!
Towns, guard towers, shipyards, lighthouses, and more can all be captured. Structures all have a unique and will supply you with gold, attack your enemy, allow you to launch more ships, etc.

UPGRADE!
Upgrade towns to increase gold production. Upgrade guard towers to increase their firepower and strengthen your defenses.

STRATEGY!
Will you aggressively capture towns to loot their gold or invest in the towns you have to increase their gold production? Wage a purely ship battle or strengthen your defenses with upgraded guard towers? Find the right strategy to beat each level.

30 UNIQUE LEVELS IN TWO WORLDS!
Combat the enemy in the tropical Caribbean then follow them into Hades in the River Styx world. More levels coming soon!

What's in this version : (Updated : May 1, 2014)

*    Reduced permissions required by game
*    Fixed graphical issue on some Samsung devices
*    Added More Games list
*    Performance optimizations
*    Misc. small tweaks
[color=fuchsia][size=6]Required Android O/S : 2.0.1+[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=blue]Google play Link:[url]https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.flashpointgames.piratesshowdown[/url][/color][/size]
[color=red][size=6]Cost In Google Play::PKR 313[/size][/color]
